channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why the Bank of England’s new stance on stablecoins could be a big deal
Aerial photos reveal man's disturbing illegal scheme: 'A serious offense'
Police in Australia seize guns from dozens of owners who hold views rejecting government authority
‘A mystery to me:’ Eisenhower library director ousted after sword denial, but he doesn’t blame Trump
Two dead including teenager and 12 more wounded in mass shooting in Alabama
French Prime Minister resigns after only 2 weeks in office
item.description: France's new prime minister, Sébastien Lecornu, has resigned just a day after naming his government and less than a month in office

item.title: WATCH: Melania Trump greets sailors with 'hooyah' at Navy 250 event
item.description: First lady Melania Trump greeted sailors with a "hooyah" as she spoke at an event celebrating the U.S. Navy's 250th anniversary in Norfolk, Virginia.

item.title: Government shutdown updates: Senate to vote Monday on stopgap-funding measures
item.description: The Senate is scheduled to reconvene at 3 p.m. ET on Monday, as the federal government shutdown continues into its sixth day.

item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Egypt to host ceasefire talks with Hamas and Israel
item.description: Hamas responded positively to President Donald Trump's proposal for peace in Gaza, though said more negotiations will be needed before a full agreemen...

item.title: Rescuers helping hundreds of Mount Everest hikers trapped by heavy snow
item.description: Rescue workers were helping hundreds of hikers trapped by heavy snow at tourist campsites on a slope of Mount Everest in Tibet, Chinese state media sa...

item.title: Appeal could extend mandatory prison term for Australia mushroom murderer
item.description: Prosecutors say a woman convicted of murdering family members with toxic mushrooms was given a "manifestly inadequate" sentence, and they want it exte...

item.title: 10/5: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Americans fed up with how Trump, GOP and Democrats are handling shutdown, poll finds; Second life for California trees burned in wildfires

item.title: Israel-Hamas negotiations spurred by Trump ceasefire plan to start
item.description: Trump wants Israeli and Hamas negotiators to "move fast" in new talks aimed at securing a ceasefire in the Gaza war, spurred by his 20-point plan.

item.title: Feds shoot woman in Chicago after allegedly being rammed, boxed in by cars
item.description: The woman, as well as a man whom authorities say was involved in the chaos, were facing charges Sunday morning.

item.title: Ex-NFL quarterback Mark Sanchez stabbed multiple times in altercation leading to charges against him
Federal judge temporarily blocks Trump administration from sending National Guard troops to Oregon
item.description: A federal judge temporarily blocked the Trump administration from deploying any National Guard units to Oregon, including the California National Guar...

item.title: WATCH: Hamas responds to President Trump's proposal to end Gaza war

item.title: Using helicopters and chemical agents, immigration agents become increasingly aggressive in Chicago
